cast.original_title: Born on the Fourth of July
cast.overview: Paralyzed in the Vietnam war, Ron Kovic becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country he fought for.
cast.title: Born on the Fourth of July

details.biography: Rob Camilletti was born on August 1, 1964 in Queens, New York City, New York, USA. He is an actor, known for Born on the Fourth of July (1989), Loverboy (1989) and Soapdish (1991).
details.name: Rob Camilletti
details.place_of_birth: Queens, New York City, New York, USA
